These Tags are recognised by Darter:

= Overview =
== Classes ==

  * author
  * package
  * copyright
  * deprecated

== Methods ==

  * author
  * deprecated
  * param
  * return

= Detailed Description =

  * `@author Mr. Foobar`
  * `@package foo.bar`
  * `@copyright by Mr. 42`
  * `@deprecated ` or with comment: `@deprecated since V.4.5`
  * `@param string $foobar` use this annotation once for every parameter
  * `@return string $foobar`
  
= Yet to be implemented =

  * `@access private` this class/method won't appear in documentation
  * `@example http://example.org/code.txt` an example with syntax highlighting
  * `@internal method details for internal use` additional documentation e.g. for developers
  * `@link http://example.org link text, http://additionalexample.org` provide additional informations in form of a link
  * `@see file.php|elementname|class::methodname()|class::$variablename`
  * `@since version x.y`
  * `@version version x.y`
  * `@throws Exception description`
